Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.utils

Record Class Point

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame.utils.Point
Record Components:
x - x-coordinate
y - y-coordinate
public record Point(int x, int y) extends Record
Represents a point on the GameModel. In case of ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.snakegame and inner packages, the coordinates are supposed to be non-negative.

  • Method Details

    • random

      public static Point random(int xLimit, int yLimit)
      Instantiates a point in a random position with x and y coordinates exclusively less than respectively specified xLimit and yLimit and inclusively greater than 0.
      Parameters:
      xLimit - x-coordinate limit
      yLimit - y-coordinate limit
      Returns:
      a point with random coordinates within specified limits

    • shift

      public Point shift(Point move)
      Returns a new point that is moved by shift from the current point.
      Parameters:
      move - movement
      Returns:
      a new point that is moved by shift from the current point

    • shift

      public Point shift(Point shift, int xLimit, int yLimit)
      Returns a new point that is moved by shift from the current point. If resulting point is out of the field with specified xLimit and yLimit, it will be moved to the opposite side of the field.
      Parameters:
      shift - movement
      xLimit - x-coordinate limit
      yLimit - y-coordinate limit
      Returns:
      a new point that is moved by shift from the current point

    • connected

      public boolean connected(Point to)
      Returns true if the current point is connected to the specified point. Two points are connected if they are adjacent to each other.
      Parameters:
      to - point to check connection with
      Returns:
      true if the current point is connected to the specified point

    • shortestVector

      public Point shortestVector(Point to, int xLimit, int yLimit)
      Returns a vector that is the shortest way from the current point to the specified point.
      Parameters:
      to - point to calculate vector to
      xLimit - x-coordinate limit
      yLimit - y-coordinate limit
      Returns:
      a vector that is the shortest way from the current point to the specified point

    • cathetusDistance

      public int cathetusDistance(Point to, int xLimit, int yLimit)
      Returns the distance between the current point and the specified point. The distance is calculated as the sum of absolute values of the differences between the coordinates of the current point and the specified point. Ones are calculated by shortestVector(Point, int, int).
      Parameters:
      to - point to calculate distance to
      xLimit - x-coordinate limit
      yLimit - y-coordinate limit
      Returns:
      the cathetus distance between the current point and the specified point

      Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with '=='.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
